name: masterdock.frontend
description: This is frontend application for masterdock.
author: Keisuke Mutoh <kmutoh@wazzup.jp>

scripts.test: echo "See package.json => scripts for available tests." && exit 0
scripts.test:e2e: cross-env NODE_ENV=test start-test "quasar dev" http-get://127.0.0.1:8080 "cypress open --e2e"
scripts.test:e2e:record: cross-env NODE_ENV=test start-test "quasar dev" http-get://127.0.0.1:8080 "cypress open --e2e --record --key $CYPRESS_KEY"
scripts.test:e2e:ci: cross-env NODE_ENV=test start-test "quasar dev" http-get://127.0.0.1:8080 "cypress run --e2e"
scripts.test:e2e:ci:record: cross-env NODE_ENV=test start-test "quasar dev" http-get://127.0.0.1:8080 "cypress run --e2e --record --key $CYPRESS_KEY"
